entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 21 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
